settings.content: ReConvert helps you sell more, by making it easy to optimize your post-purchase journey. Add checkout upsells, one-click upsells, thank you page offers & more in minutes.

settings.label: Age Check
settings.info: Verify visitors age to ensure compliance before allowing access to your store. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10428965-how-to-use-the-age-check-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Agree to Terms
settings.info: Require customers to accept your terms and conditions before completing their checkout. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10428949-how-to-use-the-agree-to-terms-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Cart Bubble
settings.info: See the number of items in your cart at a glance with a clear and convenient visual cue. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10428926-how-to-use-the-cart-bubble-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.info: Swap the page favicon to a secondary image when a product is added to the cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10429034-how-to-use-the-cart-favicon-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.info: Show a cookie consent box to ensure your website stays GDPR-compliant and user-friendly. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10428943-how-to-use-the-cookie-box-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Infinite Scroll
settings.info: Replace pagination with 'Load More' or auto-load items for smoother scrolling. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10429023-how-to-use-the-infinite-scroll-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Linked Options

settings.label: Page Transition

settings.label: Scrollbar & Cursor
settings.info: Customize scrollbars and cursors to perfectly match your brand‚Äôs style and identity. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10428906-how-to-use-the-scrollbar-and-cursor-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Skip Cart
settings.info: Send buyers directly to checkout, skipping the cart page for a quicker purchase process. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10429011-how-to-use-the-skip-cart-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Add-on Cart
settings.info: Increase average order value by suggesting products directly in the cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10912836-how-to-use-the-add-on-cart-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Back in Stock
settings.info: Let customers subscribe to back-in-stock alerts and stay updated on product availability. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10429124-how-to-use-the-back-in-stock-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Back to Top
settings.info: Let users quickly return to the top of the page with a single click, no scrolling needed. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10429171-how-to-use-the-back-to-top-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Cart Discount

settings.label: Cart Countdown Timer

settings.label: Cart Notification
settings.info: Show a bottom notification with a 'View Cart' button when a product is added to the cart. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10429202-how-to-use-the-cart-notification-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Cart Reminder

settings.label: Cart Savings

settings.label: Cart Testimonial

settings.label: Cart Upsell

settings.label: Cart Benefits and Guarantees

settings.label: Collection Filters
settings.info: Let visitors filter products on collection pages by their preferred parameters easily. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10429282-how-to-use-the-collection-filters-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Customizable Products
settings.info: Add multiple options and fields to let customers easily customize your products. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10429338-how-to-use-the-customizable-products-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Delivery Date

settings.label: Delivery Time
settings.info: Show an estimated delivery date to keep customers informed and enhance their experience. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10429367-how-to-use-the-delivery-time-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Variant Picker in cart

settings.label: Discount Saved

settings.label: Gift Wrap

settings.label: Inactive Tab Message

settings.label: Inventory Quantity

settings.label: Minimum Order

settings.label: Product Bullet Points
settings.info: Show short, easy-to-read product details to help customers make informed decisions. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10434400-how-to-use-the-product-bullet-points-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Product Tabs
settings.info: Add extra product details in customizable tabs for an organized, informative display. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10434415-how-to-use-the-product-tabs-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Sale Popup Notification
settings.info: Show real-time purchase updates to create urgency and enhance your store's credibility.  [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10434558-how-to-use-the-sales-popup-notification-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Shipping Calculator
settings.info: Allow customers to calculate shipping costs in real-time for a smoother checkout process. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10434990-how-to-use-the-shipping-calculator-widget-in-the-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.info: Show customer ratings to build trust, boost credibility, and increase conversions. [Learn more](https://help.debutify.com/en/articles/10912924-how-to-use-the-star-rating-widget-for-debutify-theme-version-8)

settings.label: Upsell Bundles
